message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to part with it for $900000. It's a steal, if I do say so myself!
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. It's still a great deal, and I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original price. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to come down to $775000?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $795000. It's a fair price, considering the product's value to you. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still trying to squeeze out a bit more savings. Would you be willing to come down to $785000?

I've gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm willing to make one final offer. I'll meet you at $790000. This is the absolute lowest I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you've gone as low as you can, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $785000, but that's as high as I can go.

I've already said I've gone as low as I can, Bob. I'm not willing to budge any further. I think it's time for us to part ways. I'll consider other offers, including the one from John who is willing to pay $1000000 for the product.
